name: Ufo Escape (daanishmufti)
description: The game features a UFO that is lost in a Dark universe and your only hope is a flash light and a bottom green light to guide you through obstacles and help you escape .Just avoid colliding with the obstacles otherwise all hope is lost and you will be trapped in the dark abyss. The game includes a score board which increments when you pass through one obstacle/wall  .The Menu would get updated showing your highest score .And that is it , Enjoy  :)
